hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Aishah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“If a man stays among a people, he should not fast without their permission.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ نَزَلَ بِقَوْمٍ فَلاَ يَصُومُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِمْ
chapter.eng-name: One who stays among a people should not fast without their permission
